document.full_text: a new international monetary fund working paper argues that the focus in the dodd-frank act on central clearing of derivatives is not the best solution. but there are strong counterarguments to consider.
document.title: the problems with derivatives clearing
lines_and_colors: a new international monetary fund working paper argues that the focus in the dodd-frank act on central clearing of derivatives is not the best solution. but there are strong counterarguments to consider.
